name: Rest (itch)
description:
Rest is an atmospheric walking simulator created for #extragamejam by Extra Credits.

2 min walkthrough.

UPDATE: This game is currently being developed further with a bigger team and will be re-uploaded with much more content in about 4-5 months!

Art and design - Hanna L. Folkestad , https://hannafolkestad.itch.io/

Sound Design - Oda Tilset, https://soundcloud.com/odatilset

Programming - Ståle K. Martinsen, https://zenris.itch.io/
